Susan Fowler
Director of Catering & Events
Club Tours by Appointment
Please contact Susan Fowler to arrange a tour of our Club!
sfowler@ppines.com

About
Club 19 -
The perfect venue for your perfect event
!
Club 19 has something for everyone, from intimate weddings and social occasions to large scale events or corporate meetings /events. Our beautiful rustic setting, which is at the Pembroke Lakes Golf Course boasts a neutral ballroom space capable of hosting a wide variety of events for groups as intimate as 10 or lavish events with
up to 180 guests.
Regardless of your event’s size, our experienced and seasoned event planners will walk you through every step of the event planning process. Conveniently located in west Broward at the Pembroke Lakes Golf & Racquet Club, our venue books events from the tri-county area.
Event Types
Weddings
Rehearsal Dinners
Bat/Bar Mitzvah's
Corporate Parties
Holiday Parties
Bridal Showers
Baby Showers
Sweet 16
Quinceañera
Corporate Events
Call Us Today To Set Up A Tour Or For More Information 954-538-3731
